original_text: And the king of Egypt said unto them, Wherefore do ye, Moses and Aaron, let the people from their works? get you unto your burdens.
korean_text: 애굽 왕이 그들에게 이르되 모세와 아론아 너희가 어찌하여 백성의 노역을 쉬게 하려느냐 가서 너희의 노역이나 하라

sentences.original_text: And the king of Egypt said unto them
Wherefore do ye, Moses and Aaron
let the people from their works?
